titleStmt.title: The maintenance of free trade according to the three essentiall parts of traffique; namely, commodities, moneys and exchange of moneys, by bills of exchanges for other countries, or, An answer to a treatise of free trade, or the meanes to make trade flourish, lately published. ... By Gerard Malynes merchant.
titleStmt.author: Malynes, Gerard, fl. 1586-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. L[egatt] for William Sheffard, and are to bee sold at his shop, at the entring in of Popes head Allie out of Lumbard street,

notesStmt.note: In answer to STC 17986: Misselden, Edward. Free trade.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the entring in of Popes head Allie out of Lumbard street
